pr_title: Rev Azure Core Versions After Release

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if these version changes are OK. In theory, the dependency-version should be set to the most recent released version and the current-version is set to the next version to be released. Further, there's still the entry for unreleased_com.azure:azure-core;1.3.0-beta.1. At a minimum, I'm going to insist that the unreleased core version be set to the current version of core, which is how these entries are supposed to be setup.
timeline.author: JimSuplizio

replies.bodyText: Updated the unreleased version of Azure Core to 1.3.0-beta.2. The reason I want to keep the dependency version of Azure Core to 1.2.0 is it will allow the repository to be in a ready to ship state in case we need to do an off-cycle release we won't need to figure out what, if any, changes depended on a version of Azure Core that is in beta and can't be used as a GA dependency.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Update unreleased version of Azure Core
